Self.Wiki: Determines the parameters for shadow maps.

lightDegRotX.Wiki: The horizontal angle of the light source affecting this shadow map. In degrees.

lightDegRotY.Wiki: The vertical angle of the light source affecting this shadow map. In degrees.

densityRatio.Wiki: The density of the shadow map. 100% is the darkest value.

colR.Wiki: The red component of the coloring for the shadow map.

colG.Wiki: The green component of the coloring for the shadow map.

colB.Wiki: The blue component of the coloring for the shadow map.

beginDist.Wiki: The start distance for the shadow map. 0 means the camera's near clip is used. In metres.

endDist.Wiki: The end distance for the shadow map. In metres.

calibulateFar.Wiki: The distance to shorten the end distance by when facing the light source direction.

fadeBeginDist.Wiki: The start distance for fading the shadow map. In metres.

fadeDist.Wiki: The end distance for fading the shadow map. In metres.

persedDepthOffset.Wiki: The z-offset for the shadow map. Negative values reduce the amount of self-shadowing that occurs.

gradFactor.Wiki: Adjusts the perspective of the shadow map. Negative values reduce the perspective, vice versa.

shadowVolumeDepth.Wiki: The depth of the shadow volume for this shadow map. Increase value for large objects.
